title: Boosting
body: This player I looked him up ... Never ever play twitch before and then he plays around 8 twitch ranked and doesn't amazing in all and even gets a pentakill..., sure this can happen but j was sure because recently HE STOPPED playing twitch all together

replies.body:
He could just be a one trick pony.
There were a lot of players that were able to get a high rank but they couldn't play other champions that well so they would drop down to a lower rank then go back too their pony to get back to the higher rank.

Hi, could you please remove the name and link as it is [against the rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) to name and shame. ♥

While it is a little suspicious, it is completely possible that they legitimately got good. I have a friend who went from silver to diamond during preseason/before mid-feb this year, as well as a friend who went from bronze 5 to diamond in half a year. Usually ranked stats are better than norms anyway.

It's also possible that he is playing 5man premade,  and his team works really really well together with all the communication and co-ordination needed to get those kinds of scores.

If you are suspicious of a player for this, be sure to report them in the post game lobby.
Problem is that he starts losing as soon as he stops playing twitch
Hay what happened to your blue-ness?

Not my board, no colour change :)
(I only go blue in gameplay and misc)

ohhh, but what not all the time?
I guess it makes a little sense.

Because I saw Crunch yesterday and he didn't have it, his comment was even deleted.
And I got worried :(

Sorry but name and shaming is not ok.
I know it sucks, but can you please remove the link.

If you suspect him of cheating them report his as such, and if you need/have too. Write a support ticket.
